description: This file defines a React functional component named Transactions for a personal finance tracker application. It manages state for filtering and displaying transaction data, fetches data from an ExpensesAPI service, and renders UI elements such as filters, a data table, and delete confirmation dialog.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches transaction data from the ExpensesAPI based on current filters, updates the data state, and manages the loading state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a selected transaction via ExpensesAPI and refreshes the data; handles errors gracefully.

ctags.name: [ { key: "date", header: "Date" }, { key: "category", header: "Category" }, { key: "note", header: "Note" }, { key: "type", header: "Type", render: (v) => <Tag type={v === "income" ? "success" : "neutral"}>{v}</ }, { key: "amount", header: "Amount", align: "right", render: (v, row) => <span className={row.type === "income" ? "pos" : "neg"}>${Number(v).toFixed(2)}</ { key: "actions", header: "", render: (_v, row) => ( <div className="row-actions"> <Button size="sm" className="ghost" onClick={() => alert(`Edit ${row.id}`)}>Edit</ <Button size="sm" className="danger" onClick={() => setToDelete(row)}>Delete</ </ ), align: "right", }, ]
[ { value: "all", label: "All" }, { value: "income", label: "Income" }, { value: "expense", label: "Expense" }, ]
note || ""}"?
ctags.pattern: /^        message={`This action cannot be undone. Proceed to delete "${toDelete?.note || ""}"?`}$/
